item.title: Approach explanation for beginners who are in the top 1.5% (0.83732) in Kaggle Titanic_2
item.description: [Last time](https://qiita.com/shiroino11111/items/bc3889fa38ff32d46c13),followedby[KaggleTitanic](https://www.kaggle.com/c/titanic/submissions)totop1.5%(0.83732) I will explain the approach of. The code used is titanic(0.83732)_2 from Github. This time, we will extend the submission score to 0.81339 and prepare for the next time it will be 0.83732. Also, before forecasting, we will visualize the data used in Last time and analyze the data. ###1. Import the required library and read the CSV. import pandas as pd import numpy as np import matplotlib.
